META.DESCRIPTION: Stay updated with the latest programming news, technology updates, and community announcements from our coding Discord server.
META.KEYWORDS: tech news, programming updates, coding news, technology updates, community announcements
META.TITLE: Tech News & Updates - Coding [EN,GER]

RULES.ADVERTISING_CONTENT1: Any kind of third-party advertising is prohibited.
RULES.ASKING_QUESTIONS_CONTENT1: Nobody is obliged to help or answer a question. Help is generally free of charge.
RULES.ASKING_QUESTIONS_CONTENT2: Members with the role of "HELPER" have volunteered to help with questions.
RULES.ASKING_QUESTIONS_CONTENT3: Pinging members to expect a faster response is not allowed.
RULES.ASKING_QUESTIONS_CONTENT4: Don't ask questions like "Does anyone know about XY?" ask the question directly, see also ➔ https://dontasktoask.com/.
RULES.ASKING_QUESTIONS_CONTENT5: Note the thread "How do I ask a good question?" on Stackoverflow ➔ https://stackoverflow.com/help/how-to-ask.
RULES.DIRECT_MESSAGES_CONTENT1: Please refrain from sending direct messages to the administrators.
RULES.DISCORD_GUIDELINES_CONTENT1: The Discord Community Guidelines apply to Programming [DE/EN]; users can view these at https://discord.com/guidelines.
RULES.ENFORCEMENT_CONTENT1: The interpretation of the rules is at the discretion of the respective administrator.
RULES.LANGUAGE_CONTENT1: The language of our community is German and English. In the voice channel "Public [DE]" German is the primary language. Users can speak English voluntarily. However, users must speak English in the Voice Channel "Public [EN]".

META.DESCRIPTION: Guidelines and rules for our programming community to ensure a helpful and respectful environment for all members.
META.KEYWORDS: community rules, guidelines, code of conduct, server rules
META.TITLE: Community Guidelines - Coding [EN,GER]

RULES.MODERATORS_CONTENT1: The moderation team has the right to take appropriate actions against a user, even if a certain rule has not been explicitly violated. Moderator actions can include escalating actions taken when the user refuses to obey decisions made.
RULES.PERSONAL_INFO_CONTENT1: Dissemination of other people's personal information of any kind without their consent is prohibited and will result in a permanent ban. This includes, for example, first name, last name, address, mobile phone number or pictures, etc.
RULES.RECORDING_CONTENT1: The recording of videos (screen sharing, webcam) and sound (voice chat) is not permitted on this Discord.
RULES.TITLE: Rules

META.TITLE: Our Team - Coding [EN,GER]
